name: Pawaa File
summary: Learn about .PAW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Pawaa Software products that are designed for use with the pawaaFILE format integrate with any enterprise application, including Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Adobe Acrobat, and others. In each application, users can save a document as a PAW file and then securely transmit it to recipients via email or a company network.
NOTE: SecurelyShare is no longer developed and has been discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
